text: Seems she died from septicemia/ lack of care, not lack of an abortion. Most likely there already was a fetal death after that heartbeat was detected, and she needed to have the deceased child removed, not an abortion (as in killing the child and removing). Try again.
author: ColetteMoran

text: When abortion was not allowed in Ireland, women and children were taken care of - one of the best countries for the welfare of both mother and child. India and China have abortion - children don’t fare well there for different reasons. Try again.
author: ColetteMoran

text: The *child* is the crisis?! No, poverty, abuse, lack of education/employment opportunities, deadbeat dads - *those* problems shouldn’t be “solved” by sacrificing a child’s life. Women and children deserve better solutions. I refuse to choose violence -we can do better and should!
author: ColetteMoran
